Class HPBar

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      HPBar

public class HPBar
extends greenfoot.Actor

HPBar is a Greenfoot Actor that display the percentage value in a circular bar. The color of the bar is going to be adjusted(from green to red) basing on the current percentage of hp.

Version:
Sept 2014
Author:
Tyler Zhang

Constructor Summary
HPBar()
          Creates a HPBar with the default hp value, 100 and set the current HP value to full.
HPBar(int max, int current)
          Creates a HPBar given a max hp and real-time hp.
HPBar(int max, int current, boolean destroy)
          Creates a HPBar given a max hp and real-time hp and set whether the hp bar will self destruct when the hp run out.

Constructor Detail

HPBar

public HPBar()
Creates a HPBar with the default hp value, 100 and set the current HP value to full.

HPBar

public HPBar(int max,
             int current)
Creates a HPBar given a max hp and real-time hp.

Parameters:
max - The maximum amount of hp that the player can have.
current - The current amount of hp that the player has.

HPBar

public HPBar(int max,
             int current,
             boolean destroy)
Creates a HPBar given a max hp and real-time hp and set whether the hp bar will self destruct when the hp run out.

Parameters:
max - The maximum amount of hp that the player can have.
current - The current amount of hp that the player has.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - Check to see if whether to increase or decrease the hp depending on key press. the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

decrease

public void decrease()
Decrement the current hp value by 1.

decrease

public void decrease(int n)
Decrement the current hp value by a certain value.

Parameters:
n - the value that the hp will decrease by.

getColor

public java.awt.Color getColor(double per)
Generate a HSB color from green to red basing on the precentage ratio of hp.

Parameters:
per - The percentage ratio of curHP to maxHP.
Returns:
Color The HSB color that corespond to the percent ratio.

increase

Increment the current hp value by 1.

increase

public void increase(int n)
Increment the current hp value by a certain value.

Parameters:
n - the value that the hp will increase by.

update

public void update(double per)
Expects new HP percent and reprint the image of the HP Bar.

Parameters:
per - The percentage ratio of curHP to maxHP.

update

public void update(int current)
Update the HPBar with a new hp value. The new hp value will be set as curHP.

Parameters:
current - The new current hp value.

update

public void update(int dif,
                   boolean upDown)
Update the HPBar with a new adjustment. The value will be either added to or subtracted from the curHP value basing on the value of boolean upDown.

Parameters:
dif - The adjustment value that will be apply to curHP
upDown - True for increase HP, false for decrease.
